item.title: Can this work?
item.description: To add a post, we need to first add it in atlas_site/content/post/new-post.md. Then regenerate the webiste by running the command hugo in the terminal (within the atlas_site folder). Then go ahead and git add .Â git commit -m "appropriate message" ]git push origin master But this only updates the site code in the atlas_site repo: github.com/CvilleEquityAtlas/atlas_site To update the generated site, we cd into the public folder, and do it against

item.title: Contact
item.description: This is an example of a custom shortcode that you can put right into your content. You will need to add a form action to the the shortcode to make it work. Check out Formspree for a simple, free form service. Your Name Email Address An email address is required. Message
